org.mt4j.input.inputSources
Interface IinputSourceListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractGlobalInputProcessor, CursorTracer, GlobalUnistrokeProcessor, InputRetargeter, RawFiducialProcessor, RawFingerProcessor
public interface IinputSourceListener

The listener interface for receiving iinputSource events. The class that is interested in processing a iinputSource event implements this interface, and the object created with that class is registered with a component using the component's addIinputSourceListener method. When the iinputSource event occurs, that object's appropriate method is invoked.

Author:
Christopher Ruff
See Also:
MTInputEvent
